name: Look Out! - A Stealth Horror Game
name_original: Look Out! - A Stealth Horror Game
description:
You've been kidnapped by a man who is severely psychotic, you found a new best friend, and you two have to fight for your life stealthily making choices to make it out in one piece. #adventure

Contents:

  • Three Unique Endings
  • Incredible Dialogue
  • Stunning Visuals
  • Magnificent Detail
  • Incredible Fights
